Change the display name of a wallet key.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the rename_key endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Rename a wallet key","required":["fingerprint","name"],"properties":{"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Wallet fingerprint","example":1234567890,"minimum":0},"name":{"type":"string","description":"New display name"}},"title":"RenameKey"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
